  Item 9.01.  Financial Statements and        
              Exhibits                        
                                              
Exhibits are filed herewith in connection with
the Registration Statement on Form S-3(File   
No. 333-236148)filed by Wells Fargo & Company 
with the Securities and Exchange Commission.  
On May 19, 2021, Wells Fargo & Company issued 
the Medium-Term Notes, Series U,              
$1,000,000,000 Senior Redeemable Fixed-to-    
FloatingRate Notes due May 19, 2025 (the      
“Notes”). The purpose of this Current Report  
is to file with the Securities and Exchange   
Commission the form of Note related to the    
issuance and the opinion of Faegre Drinker    
Biddle & Reath LLP regarding the Notes. (d)   
Exhibits
